alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 8:04PM EDT until June 03 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 804 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Havana, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quincy, Havana, Attapulgus, Freemont, Littman, Darsey, Florence, Concord, Scotland, Jamieson, Gibson, Laingkat, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Amsterdam, Quincy Airport, Branchville, Hinson and Dogtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
